import React, { Component } from 'react'; import user from '../images/user.jpg'; import Chart from './charts/Chart'; import Patient from './charts/Patient'; import Revenue from './charts/Revenue'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faPlus, faEllipsisV, faCaretUp, faCaretDown, faFolder, faChartLine, faCommentAlt, faSlidersH } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap-grid-component'; class Metrics extends Component { render() { // Styles const staffName = { color: 'purple', padding: '2px' }; return (

1 2 3 4

Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Nov
2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020
{' '}

-0.1{' '}

4.2m

+2.4{' '}

NO Staff Name Efficiency Delta NPS Delta Efficiency Reported Issues
1 Mercy Mukoya 1.3   +0.2{' '} {' '} 1.2 +0.3{' '} 96%
3
2 Kennedy Ayako 1.8   +0.4{' '} 1.8 +0.2{' '} 92%
6
3 Stephanie Tomsett 2.7   2.5 2.0   1.8 58%
1
3 Faith Kityo 2.8   -0.5{' '} 2.5   -2.1{' '} 74%
8
); } } export default Metrics;
